newsitem.title: JAPAN: TOCOM raises November rubber futures margin fees.
newsitem.headline: TOCOM raises November rubber futures margin fees.

text.p: The Tokyo Commodity Exchange (TOCOM) said on Tuesday that it would raise the margin requirement on its November rubber futures contract by 40,000 yen per trading lot, effective from Wednesday.
The increase will bring the total November margin requirement to 102,500 yen, TOCOM said in a statement.
The increase is aimed at cooling overheated trade.
The requirement on the spot October contract will be unchanged at 157,750 yen, while those on other contracts will remain at 52,500 yen.
